Weavile (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0460: Abomasnow
Pokémon
#0462: Magnezone →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Weavile (TCG Pocket).

Weavile has been featured on 20 different cards since it debuted in the Movie Commemoration VS Pack: Aura's Lucario of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Weavile cards are normally Darkness-type or Water-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Weavile

Weavile
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
